lines.text:
[as Curtayne enters the court]
James P. Curtayne - complete with carnation.

[Confidently]
Never enter the ring without it.

[Near the eel tank]
One thing about eels... give 'em air.

[Ricks brings in Frank Korvac]
Here he is... people's witness.

[Watching Curtanne take a drink]
Couldn't beat it, could yuh? Just a worn out old lush!
Then you should know about a court order.
